stories.text:
I am an academic / PI at a university in the UK, which has recently allocated funding to support Ukrainian researchers.

If anyone knows of any Ukrainian academics who might be interested in conducting research in the UK, particularly graduate students or those interested in graduate study, could you please pass along my email address (my.hn.email.address@gmail.com)?

Our centre can support research across the fields of computer science, engineering, biosciences, and policy research.
stories.title: Ask HN: Ukrainian Academics and Graduate Students

MS DirectX stack now works in ReactOS with 3D acceleration on real hardware
Start your open source journey with Community Exchange

Amazon consumer chief Dave Clark to join Flexport as its new CEO

stories.text:
I just started working at a B2B saas startup in Toronto as their Marketing Manager, but they also have me doing sales right now.

The problem is that getting the first sales seem to be a lot more difficult than anticipated.

Is there anyone that'd be willing to give me some input? We've gone the LinkedIn and cold email drip route, but I'm not sure if we're thinking about our initial methods correctly.

This is my first time doing marketing and sales for a startup (or any other company), so I'd be super appreciative of any advice someone has to offer.
stories.title: Ask HN: Need marketing/sales advice for SaaS startup
